Title: Corporate Borrowers
Description: An borrower is a legal entity that develops, registers and sells securities to finance its operations. Borrowers may be corporations, investment trusts, or domestic or foreign governments

Title: Investment in bonds
Description: Stock  a security that represents the ownership of a fraction of the issuing corporation.

Title: Investment in bonds
Description: Bond is debt instrument issued by a government, corporation or other entity to finance and expand their operations.
